name: update_subscription
description: Update an existing and specific subscription

x-anchore-account.description: An account name to change the resource scope of the request to that account, if permissions allow (admin only)

SubscriptionUpdate.description: A modification to a subscription entry to change its status or value

active.description: Toggle the subscription processing on or off

subscription_value.description: The new subscription value, e.g. the new tag to be subscribed to

$ul: **subscription_id**: the unique id for this subscription record
**subscription_key**: The key value that the subscription references. E.g. a tag value or a repo name.
**subscription_value**: The value of the subscription target
**userId**: The userId of the subscribed user
